actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-996.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R.  4613) to reauthorize appropriations to carry out the Commodity Exchange Act, and to make technical improvements to that Act, and against the consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 4613 (commodity exchanges) and against its consideration.

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R.  4613) to reauthorize appropriations to carry out the Commodity Exchange Act, and to make technical improvements to that Act, and against the consideration of such conference report.
